372300.name: Knee Deep - Digital Playbill and Soundtrack
372300.description:
Complete your theater experience with the official Knee Deep Digital Playbook. This 18-page guide to the world of Knee Deep features a complete Who's Who of the cast, special articles reprinted from the Cypress Knee Notice and gossip blog Fanrage, and advertisements from local business such as the Mohawk Inn and Snug 'N Soft diapers.

Also included with the Digital Playbill is a selection of three tunes from the original soundtrack: "Knee Deep Theme," "Dirt (Romana)," and "Radio Song."

  • Go behind the scenes of Knee Deep with details on characters, plot lines and more
  • Special edition EP with three songs from the soundtrack - "Knee Deep Theme," "Dirt (Romana)," and "Radio Song"
  • Check out ads from top Cypress Knee sponsors
372300.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
